job_description:
Company: CloudNative
Position: DevOps Engineer
Location: New York, NY (On-site)
Salary: $140,000 - $170,000

About Us:
CloudNative is a cloud-native solutions provider. We help businesses migrate to the cloud and optimize their cloud infrastructure. Our team is passionate about helping our customers succeed.

Job Description:
We are looking for a DevOps Engineer to join our team. You will be responsible for automating our infrastructure and deployment pipelines. The ideal candidate will have experience with Docker, Kubernetes, and AWS.

Responsibilities:
- Automate infrastructure provisioning and deployment
- Monitor system performance and troubleshoot issues
- Improve our CI/CD pipeline
- Collaborate with development and operations teams

Requirements:
- Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field
- 3+ years of experience in DevOps
- Experience with Docker and Kubernetes
- Experience with AWS

Preferred Qualifications:
- Experience with Terraform
- Experience with Ansible
- Experience with Prometheus

Benefits:
- Competitive salary and benefits package
- Stock options
- Opportunity to work with a talented team
